hieros

𓃀 Ein Bein (1 foot 1 podOn 1 podUs) on/as/us=1 eins
𓂾𓃀 Beide Beine (2 poDi/feet) di=2

bi/du/tu 𓏏𓏏 as syllable for duality already was present in Egypt:

1 𓌠𓏤 bone (har)poon𓌡 vs 𓌟𓏤 boin (binary) 𓃀𓃀 𓄹𓄻vs
2 𓌟 thun,toe ~ keras 𓈎𓋴𓌟 (horn)
2 𓈇 tawi two-towns | two-lands dawlant(AR)=state! vs län.der𓇾

2 tion 𓎼𓈖𓏌𓅱𓏏𓌟𓌟𓌟𓏛𓏛𓏛 generations
